verses.text: The \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \add is\add* the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and the \w fulness|strong="H4393"\w* thereof; the \w world|strong="H8398"\w*, and they that \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* therein.
For he hath \w founded|strong="H3245"\w* it upon the \w seas|strong="H3220"\w*, and \w established|strong="H3559"\w* it upon the \w floods|strong="H5104"\w*.

Who shall \w ascend|strong="H5927"\w* into the \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*? or who shall \w stand|strong="H6965"\w* in his \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*?

He that hath \w clean|strong="H5355"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*, and a \w pure|strong="H1249"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*; who hath not lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* his \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* unto \w vanity|strong="H7723"\w*, nor \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* \w deceitfully|strong="H4820"\w*.\f + \fr 24.4 \ft He…: Heb. The clean of hands\f*

He shall \w receive|strong="H5375"\w* the \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* from the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of his \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w*.

This \add is\add* the \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* of them that \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* him, that \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, O \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.\f + \fr 24.6 \ft O Jacob: or, O God of Jacob\f*

Lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* your \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*, O ye \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*; and be ye lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w*, ye \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w doors|strong="H6607"\w*; and the \w King|strong="H4428"\w* of \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* shall come \w in|strong="H0935"\w*.

Who \add is\add* this \w King|strong="H4428"\w* of \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*? The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w strong|strong="H5808"\w* and \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w*, the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* in \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*.

Lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* your \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*, O ye \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*; even lift \add them\add* \w up|strong="H5375"\w*, ye \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w doors|strong="H6607"\w*; and the \w King|strong="H4428"\w* of \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* shall come \w in|strong="H0935"\w*.

Who is this \w King|strong="H4428"\w* of \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*? The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, he \add is\add* the \w King|strong="H4428"\w* of \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.
